/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees on both sides, their leaves a vibrant green against the backdrop of the blue sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades bathed in sunlight. The sun, positioned in the top left corner of the image, casts a bright light that illuminates the scene, highlighting the colors and details of the buildings and trees.
